## graph of omaha bridges

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(psych)
library(knitr)
options(digits = 4)
omaha_bridges <- read.csv("omaha_bridges.csv")


```

```{r}
#| label: fig-omaha-map1
#| fig-cap: "Map of Omaha Bridges"
#| fig-width: 6
#| fig-height: 4
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(leaflet)
leaflet(omaha_bridges) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    lng = ~ LONG_017,
    lat = ~ LAT_016,
    radius = 5,
    color = "red",
    popup = ~paste("Bridge ID:", FACILITY_CARRIED_007)
  )
```
